attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LULmEgsZWfcZwDCssw4_itemcontent
attribs.current: Made of interlocking metal rings, chain mail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath the mail to prevent chafing and to cushion the impact of blows. The suit includes gauntlets.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LULmGzLNeUZz4Zu1bdh_itemcontent
attribs.current: A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LULnW6kNv9ZxptTcfZ8_spelldescription
attribs.current:
A creature you can see must pass a Wisdom save or take necrotic damage. If it's missing any hit points, the damage die is 1d12; otherwise, it's 1d8.

The damage increases by one die when you reach 5th, 11th, and 17th level

A creature you can see must pass a Wisdom save or take necrotic damage. If it's missing any hit points, the damage die is 1d12; otherwise, it's 1d8.

The damage increases by one die when you reach 5th, 11th, and 17th level

attribs.current: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

attribs.current: Up to three creatures of your choice within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LULq47CRwh3aXEqvQwX_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LULq47CRwh3aXEqvQwX_spelldescription
attribs.current: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the attack roll or saving throw.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LULqRS62uyDF0mRTyuC_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the ability check. The spell then ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LULqe9zAcDzrUglgixX_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one saving throw of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the saving throw. The spell then ends.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LULrZFnbZq9g9eXMuRF_description
attribs.current: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LULrgBc1kyJsK7elu5F_description
attribs.current: You have advantage on saving throws against being poisoned, and you have resistance against poison damage.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LULrtCAQjN4CXzXZYHH_description
attribs.current: You have proficiency with the battleaxe, handaxe, light hammer, and warhammer.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LULrzvXiruiZ9gb1h0P_description
attribs.current: You gain proficiency with one of smith's tools, brewer's supplies, or mason's tools.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LULs5xcUt7XXKMYrTGA_description
attribs.current: Whenever you make a History check related to the origin of stonework, you are considered proficient in the History skill and add double your proficiency bonus to the check, instead of your normal proficiency bonus.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LULsJU63ZIuDxpZkwe5_description
attribs.current: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LULwCZ0muaygZVvCO3q_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: Holy water or powdered silver and iron, which the spell consumes

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LULwCZ0muaygZVvCO3q_spelldescription
attribs.current: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch is protected against certain types of creatures: aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead. The protection grants several benefits. Creatures of those types have disadvantage on attack rolls against the target. The target also can’t be charmed, frightened, or possessed by them. If the target is already charmed, frightened, or possessed by such a creature, the target has advantage on any new saving throw against the relevant effect.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LULxdimmhsTPtlYi5Ke_description
attribs.current:
Life Domain Spells:

Level	Spells
1st	        Bless, Cure Wounds
3rd	        Lesser Restoration, 
                Spiritual Weapon
5th	        Beacon of Hope, Revivify
7th	        Death Ward, Guardian of 
                Faith
9th	        Mass Cure Wounds, 
                Raise Dead

Bonus Proficiency:
At 1st level, you gain proficiency with heavy armor.

Disciple of Life:
Also starting at 1st level, whenever you use a spell of 1st level or higher to restore hit points to a creature, the creature regains additional hit points equal to 2 + the spell's level.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LUM9fx0QfBk4rCouc8D_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch a creature and can end either one disease or one condition afflicting it. The condition can be blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LUM9joaCbAuZkteITbo_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot 3rd level of or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for every two slot levels above the 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LUM9joaCbAuZkteITbo_spelldescription
attribs.current: You create a floating, spectral weapon within range that lasts for the duration or until you cast this spell again. When you cast the spell, you can make a melee spell attack against a creature within 5 feet of the weapon. On a hit, the target takes force damage equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. As a bonus action on your turn, you can move the weapon up to 20 feet and repeat the attack against a creature within 5 feet of it. The weapon can take whatever form you choose. Clerics of deities who are associated with a particular weapon (as St. Cuthbert is known for his mace and Thor for his hammer) make this spell’s effect resemble that weapon.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LUM9yNT8JBV0egzUs32_description
attribs.current: Starting at 2nd level, as an action, you present your holy symbol and evoke healing energy that can restore a number of hit points equal to five times your cleric level. Choose any creatures within 30 feet of you, and divide those hit points among them. This feature can restore a creature to no more than half of its hit point maximum. You can't use this feature on an undead or a construct.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LUMAGecN0TqXH-AUUjQ_description
attribs.current:
At 2nd level, you start with two abilities: Turn Undead and an effect determined by your domain. Some domains grant you additional effects as you advance in levels, as noted in the domain description.

When you use your Channel Divinity, you choose which effect to create. You must then finish a short or long rest to use your Channel Divinity again.

Some Channel Divinity effects require saving throws. When you use such an effect from this class, the DC equals your cleric spell save DC.

Beginning at 6th level, you can use your Channel Divinity twice between rests, and beginning at 18th level, you can use it three times between rests. When you finish a short or long rest, you regain your expended uses.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LUMBnb8LvmCYb2IhFzT_spelltarget
attribs.current: Up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LUMBnb8LvmCYb2IhFzT_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the Healing increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LUMBnb8LvmCYb2IhFzT_spelldescription
attribs.current: Up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range each regain hit points equal to 2d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

attribs.current: While you are wearing armor, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LUw4iIIxjtBlrBpZzkG_spelltarget
attribs.current: Any number of creatures within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LUw4iIIxjtBlrBpZzkG_spelldescription
attribs.current: This spell bestows hope and vitality. Choose any number of creatures within range. For the duration, each target has advantage on Wisdom saving throws and death saving throws, and regains the maximum number of hit points possible from any healing.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LUw4nSY4fwf9nji66NK_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature that has died within the last minute

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LUw4nSY4fwf9nji66NK_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: Diamonds worth 300 gp, which the spell consumes

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LUw4nSY4fwf9nji66NK_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch a creature that has died within the last minute. That creature returns to life with 1 hit point. This spell can’t return to life a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LUw5E99TZEMnrchlRFT_spelltarget
attribs.current: One object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LUw5E99TZEMnrchlRFT_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like. Completely covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again or dismiss it as an action. If you target an object held or worn by a hostile creature, that creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw to avoid the spell.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LVGdFi7txpWXK0JpepJ_description
attribs.current: When you cast a cantrip that forces an enemy to make a saving throw, and the enemy succeeds, you may choose to (as a bonus action) envoke divine sight. The enemy then takes half damage on a success instead of no damage. At level 15 this ability no longer requires the use of a bonus action.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LW359QuvYxE8OmCeM4V_description
attribs.current:
Eldritch Knight
Spellcasting
Fighter Level	Cantrips Known	Spells Known	1st	2nd	3rd	4th
3rd	2	3	2	—	—	—
4th	2	4	3	—	—	—
7th	2	5	4	2	—	—
8th	2	6	4	2	—	—
10th	3	7	4	3	—	—
11th	3	8	4	3	—	—
13th	3	9	4	3	2	—
14th	3	10	4	3	2	—
16th	3	11	4	3	3	—
19th	3	12	4	3	3	1
20th	3	13	4	3	3	1
Cantrips
You start with 2 cantrips from the wizard spell list. At level 10 you gain a 3rd cantrip known.

Spell Slots
The Eldritch Knight Spellcasting table shows how many spell slots you have to cast your wizard spells of 1st level and higher. To cast one of these spells, you must expend a slot of the spell's level or higher. You regain all expended spell slots when you finish a long rest.

Spells Known
You know three 1st level wizard spells of your choice, two must come from the evocation and abjuration spell schools. The third spell can be from any Wizard school of magic.

The Spells Known column of the Eldritch Knight Spellcasting table shows when you learn more wizard spells of 1st level or higher. Each of these spells must be an abjuration or evocation spell of your choice, and must be of a level for which you have spell slots.

The spells you learn at 8th, 14th, and 20th level can come from any school of magic.

Whenever you gain a level in this class, you can replace one of the wizard spells you know with another spell of your choice from the wizard spell list. The new spell must be of a level for which you have spell slots, and it must be an abjuration or evocation spell, unless you're replacing the spell you gained at 3rd, 8th, 14th, or 20th level.

Spellcasting Ability
Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for your wizard spells. You use your Intelligence whenever a spell refers to your spellcasting ability.

Spell save DC = 8 + proficiency bonus + Intelligence mod

Spell attack mod = proficiency bonus + Intelligence mod

Weapon Bond
Over the course of 1 hour short rest, you can bond a weapon to you. Once bonded, you cannot be disarmed unless you are incapacitated and if the weapon is on the same plane of existence, you can summon it to your hand as a bonus action. You can bond up to two weapons at once.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LW37bpj2ZMQkfW0OtUr_spelltarget
attribs.current: A point you choose within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LW37bpj2ZMQkfW0OtUr_spelldescription
attribs.current: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration or until you dismiss it as an action. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again. You can use your action to control the hand. You can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial. You can move the hand up to 30 feet each time you use it. The hand can’t attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LW37hFDcFk74WB6dLvv_spelldescription
attribs.current:
Choose a portion of dirt or stone that you can see and fits in a 5-foot cube. You change it in one of the following ways:

If you target loose earth, you can move it up to 5 feet away. This movement doesn't deal damage.
You cause shapes and colors to appear. The changes last for 1 hour.
You cause the ground to become difficult terrain, or make difficult terrain become normal. This change lasts for 1 hour.
If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have no more than two of its non-instantaneous effects active at a time, and you can dismiss an effect as an action.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LWcQUAwvEGK7GtHIVxZ_spellcastingtime
attribs.current: 1 reaction, which you take when you are hit by an attack or targeted by the magic missile spell

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LWcQUAwvEGK7GtHIVxZ_spelldescription
attribs.current: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from magic missile.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LWcQa6nZtn4Z3bZebLC_spellcastingtime
attribs.current: 1 reaction, which you take when you or a creature within 60 feet of you falls

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LWcQa6nZtn4Z3bZebLC_spelltarget
attribs.current: Up to five falling creatures within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LWcQa6nZtn4Z3bZebLC_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A small feather or piece of down

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LWcQa6nZtn4Z3bZebLC_spelldescription
attribs.current: Choose up to five falling creatures within range. A falling creature’s rate of descent slows to 60 feet per round until the spell ends. If the creature lands before the spell ends, it takes no falling damage and can land on its feet, and the spell ends for that creature.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LWcQgMS5QtUCBHTbHGa_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LWcQgMS5QtUCBHTbHGa_spelldescription
attribs.current: As you hold your hands with thumbs touching and fingers spread, a thin sheet of flames shoots forth from your outstretched fingertips. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren’t being worn or carried.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LWcQgO1QkyZCzATKkWz_atk_desc
attribs.current:
As you hold your hands with thumbs touching and fingers spread, a thin sheet of flames shoots forth from your outstretched fingertips. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren’t being worn or carried.

At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LWcQkxr8UklLlM2uihM_spelldescription
attribs.current: When hit with acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage, you can use your reaction to have resistance to it until the start of your next turn, including against the triggering attack. Also, the first time you hit with a melee attack on your next turn, the target takes an extra 1d6 of the damage type.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LWcRUafPhIAQMqLIW3f_atk_desc
attribs.current: When hit with acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage, you can use your reaction to have resistance to it until the start of your next turn, including against the triggering attack. Also, the first time you hit with a melee attack on your next turn, the target takes an extra 1d6 of the damage type.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LWcRXD8lQYgFQe7LhA2_atk_desc
attribs.current: Choose up to five falling creatures within range. A falling creature’s rate of descent slows to 60 feet per round until the spell ends. If the creature lands before the spell ends, it takes no falling damage and can land on its feet, and the spell ends for that creature.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LWcRYvaiye54cFkYcJQ_atk_desc
attribs.current: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from magic missile.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LWfjqOxY8yiyXM3ryzs_description
attribs.current:
Turn Undead
As an action, each undead that can see or hear you within 30 feet of you must make a Wisdom saving throw. If the creature fails its saving throw, it is turned for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.

A turned creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from you as it can, and it can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of you. It also can't take reactions. For its action, it can use only the Dash action or try to escape from an effect that prevents it from moving. If there's nowhere to move, the creature can use the Dodge action.

Destroy Undead
Starting at 5th level, when an undead of CR 1/2 or lower fails its saving throw against your Turn Undead feature, the creature is instantly destroyed. The CR of undead increases as you gain levels.

Cleric Level	Destroys Undead of CR...
5th	1/2 or lower
8th	1 or lower
11th	2 or lower
14th	3 or lower
17th	4 or lower

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LWfnUu1nYspCi5ZHEXK_spelltarget
attribs.current: Up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LWfnUu1nYspCi5ZHEXK_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the Healing increases by 1d4 for each slot level above 3rd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LWfnUu1nYspCi5ZHEXK_spelldescription
attribs.current: As you call out words of restoration, up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range regain hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LWfnUwRBTwzacY43IHE_hldmg
attribs.current: {{hldmg=[[(1*?{Cast at what level?|Level 3,0|Level 4,1|Level 5,2|Level 6,3|Level 7,4|Level 8,5|Level 9,6})d4+(1*?{Cast at what level?|Level 3,0|Level 4,1|Level 5,2|Level 6,3|Level 7,4|Level 8,5|Level 9,6})]]}}

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LWfnUwRBTwzacY43IHE_rollbase_crit
attribs.current: @{wtype}&{template:dmg} {{crit=1}} {{rname=@{atkname}}} @{atkflag} {{range=@{atkrange}}} @{dmgflag} {{dmg1=[[1d4 + 5[WIS] + 5[MOD]]]}} {{dmg1type=Healing }} @{dmg2flag} {{dmg2=[[0]]}} {{dmg2type=}} {{crit1=[[1d4]]}} {{crit2=[[0]]}} @{saveflag} {{desc=@{atk_desc}}} @{hldmg} {{hldmgcrit=[[(1*?{Cast at what level?|Level 3,0|Level 4,1|Level 5,2|Level 6,3|Level 7,4|Level 8,5|Level 9,6})d4+(1*?{Cast at what level?|Level 3,0|Level 4,1|Level 5,2|Level 6,3|Level 7,4|Level 8,5|Level 9,6})]]}} {{spelllevel=@{spelllevel}}} {{innate=@{spell_innate}}} {{globaldamage=[[0]]}} {{globaldamagecrit=[[0]]}} {{globaldamagetype=@{global_damage_mod_type}}} @{charname_output}

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LWhoecZQlS1UWzXaJ2H_itemcontent
attribs.current:
Requires Attunement

You gain a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws while wearing this ring.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LWhoecZQlS1UWzXaJ2H_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Ring, Ac +1, Saving Throws +1
